markets.title: How long will Trump speak for at Announcement in the Oval Office originally scheduled for 2:00 pm ET?
markets.rules_primary: If Trump speaks for 60 or above at Announcement in the Oval Office originally scheduled for 2:00 pm ET before Sep 3, 2025, then the market resolves to Yes.
markets.rules_secondary: Speaking will be measured from first word audibly said by Trump to last word audibly said by Trump. Pauses in speech will be included in the speech time if they are between those two points.
markets.early_close_condition: This market will close and expire early if the event occurs.
